targets.rawSql:
select count(*) as "Success" from network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ntr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and
ntr.test_id in ($TestId) and
ntr.test_result = 'Success' and ntr.service_type = 'WebexCloud'

select count(*) as "Failed" from network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ntr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and
ntr.test_id in ($TestId) and
ntr.test_result = 'Failed' and ntr.service_type = 'WebexCloud'

panels.title: Overall Test Result Distribution - Webex Cloud

targets.rawSql:
select ntr.test_type, count(ntr.test_result) from 
network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ntr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and
ntr.service_type = 'WebexCloud' and
ntr.test_result = 'Success' and
ntr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ntr.test_result , ntr.test_type

panels.title: Successful Test Result Distribution - Webex Cloud

targets.rawSql:
select ntr.test_type, count(ntr.test_result) as "Failed" from 
network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ntr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and
ntr.service_type = 'WebexCloud' and
ntr.test_result = 'Failed' and
ntr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ntr.test_result , ntr.test_type

panels.title: Failed Test Result Distribution - Webex Cloud

targets.rawSql:
select ntr.test_timestamp as "time", ntr.test_type,
case when(ntr.test_result = 'Success') then 1 else 0 end as "Test Result - "
from network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id
where
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and
ntr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and 
ntr.service_type = 'WebexCloud' and
$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and
ntr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ntr.test_type, ntr.test_timestamp, ntr.test_result 
order by ntr.test_timestamp

select ntr.test_timestamp as "time", ntr.test_type,
case when(ntr.test_result = 'Success') then 1 else 0 end as "Test Result for ThirdPartyCloud:"
from network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id
where ntr.trigger_type = 'Periodic' and ntr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and ntr.test_id in ($TestId) and
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and ntr.host_name in ($HostName)
group by ntr.test_type, ntr.service_type, ntr.test_timestamp, ntr.test_result 
order by ntr.test_timestamp

panels.title: Connectivity Test Results Trend for WebexCloud

$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and
ntr.test_id in ($TestId) and
ntr.test_result = 'Failed' and ntr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud'

select ntr.test_type, count(ntr.test_result) as "Success" from 
network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ntr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and
ntr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and
ntr.test_result = 'Success' and ntr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ntr.test_result , ntr.test_type

select ntr.test_type, count(ntr.test_result) as "Failed" from 
network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ntr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and
ntr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and
ntr.test_result = 'Failed' and ntr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ntr.test_result , ntr.test_type

select ntr.test_timestamp as "time", ntr.test_type,
case when(ntr.test_result = 'Success') then 1 else 0 end as "Test Result - "
from network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id
where
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and
ntr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and 
ntr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and
$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and ntr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ntr.test_type, ntr.test_timestamp, ntr.test_result 
order by ntr.test_timestamp

select ntr.test_timestamp as "time", ntr.test_type,
case when(ntr.test_result = 'Success') then 1 else 0 end as "Test Result for ThirdPartyCloud:"
from network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id
where ntr.trigger_type = 'Periodic' and ntr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and ntr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ntr.test_type, ntr.service_type, ntr.test_timestamp, ntr.test_result 
order by ntr.test_timestamp

panels.title: Connectivity Test Results Trend for ThirdPartyCloud

targets.rawSql:
select ntr.test_timestamp as "Test Timestamp", 
ntr.test_id as "Test ID",
o.organization_name as "Organization Name", 
ntr.cluster_name as "Cluster Name", 
ntr.host_name as "Host Name", 
ntr.test_type as "Test Type", 
ntr.service_type as "Service Type", 
ntr.test_result as "Test Result",
ntr.failure_reason as "Failure Reason",
ntr.possible_remediation as "Possible Remediation"
from network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id 
where
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ntr.host_name in ($HostName) and
ntr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ntr.test_timestamp) and
ntr.test_id in ($TestId)

list.definition: select distinct organization_name from organizations o
list.label: Select Organization Name
list.name: OrganizationName
list.query: select distinct organization_name from organizations o

list.definition:
select distinct cluster_name 
from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id  
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')
list.label: Select Cluster Name
list.name: ClusterName
list.query:
select distinct cluster_name 
from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id  
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')

list.definition:
select distinct host_name 
from node_details nd join organizations o on o.organization_id = nd.organization_id  
join cluster_details cd on cd.cluster_id = nd.cluster_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName)
list.label: Select Host Name
list.name: HostName
list.query:
select distinct host_name 
from node_details nd join organizations o on o.organization_id = nd.organization_id  
join cluster_details cd on cd.cluster_id = nd.cluster_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName)

list.definition:
select distinct ntr.test_id from network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id
and o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and ntr.host_name in ($HostName)
list.label: Select Test ID
list.name: TestId
list.query:
select distinct ntr.test_id from network_test_results ntr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ntr.organization_id
and o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and ntr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and ntr.host_name in ($HostName)
